title: mediawiki/revision/create
description: Represents a MW Revision Create event.

id.description: The unique ID of this event; should match the dt field.

dt.description: The time stamp of the event, in ISO8601 format.

schema_uri.description: The URI identifying the jsonschema for this event.  This may be just a short uri containing only the name and revision at the end of the URI path.  e.g. schema_name/12345 is acceptable.  This field is not required.

page_id.description: The page ID of the page this revision belongs to.

rev_content_model.description: The content model of the revision.
